name: Alpine DevOps - Mercury
postCreateCommand:
mkdir -p ~/.ssh ~/.cache/tmp && cp -r ~/.ssh-host/* ~/.ssh/ 2>/dev/null; chmod 700 ~/.ssh && chmod 600 ~/.ssh/* 2>/dev/null; printf 'Host github.com
StrictHostKeyChecking no
UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null
IdentityFile ~/.ssh/aws
' > ~/.ssh/config; curl -fsSL https://mise.run | sh; export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" TMPDIR="$HOME/.cache/tmp"; (curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alexbenisch/dotfiles/main/setup-devcontainer | sh || true); (TMPDIR="$HOME/.cache/tmp" chezmoi init --apply --source ~/.local/share/dotfiles alexbenisch/dotfiles || true); (~/.local/bin/mise trust /workspaces 2>/dev/null || true); (~/.local/bin/mise trust ~ 2>/dev/null || true)
